00001 <?php 
00010   print "<INPUT type='hidden' name='page' value='edit'>" . LF ;
00011   $link = dbiSelect();
00012   //show_message();
00013 
00014   //Observatories
00015   $res = array();
00016   $query = "SELECT id, name, creation_date, modification_date FROM observatories ORDER BY modification_date DESC";
00017   $result = mysqli_query($link, $query);
00018   while ($row = mysqli_fetch_array($result, MYSQLI_ASSOC))
00019     $res[] = $row;
00020   mysqli_free_result($result);
00021 
00022   if (count($res) == 0)
00023   {
00024     print "<CENTER><H3>There are no Observatory entries " .
00025           "to edit.</H3></CENTER>" . LF;
00026   }
00027   else
00028   {
00029         print "<CENTER><P><TABLE border='1' cellpadding='4' width='100%' class='rtable'>" . LF;
00030     print "<CAPTION><H3 align='center'>To edit please click on the Observatory name.</H3></CAPTION>" . LF;
00031     print "<TR><TH>NAME</TH><TH>CREATION DATE</TH><TH>MODIFICATION DATE</TH></TR>" . LF;
00032 
00033     //print "<H3>Click on a the name to edit an Observatory entry</H3>" . LF;
00034     foreach ($res as $entry)
00035     {
00036         print "<TR align='center'>";
00037         print "<TD><A title='Click to edit' class='hand' " .
00038               "href='index.php?page=add&action=edit&id=" . $entry["id"] . "&res_type=obs"  .
00039               "'>" . $entry["name"] . "</A></TD>";
00040         print "<TD>" . $entry["creation_date"] . "</TD>";
00041         print "<TD>" . $entry["modification_date"] . "</TD>";
00042         print "</TR>" . LF;
00043     }
00044         print "</TABLE></P></CENTER>" . LF;
00045   }
00046   
00047   mysqli_close($link);
